pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multi-Set Split Feasibility // An implementation of the majorization-minimization (MM) algorithm introduced by Xu, Chi, Yang, and Lange (2017) arXiv:1612.05614 for solving multi-set split feasibility problems. In the multi-set split feasibility problem, we seek to find a point x in the intersection of multiple closed sets and whose image under a mapping also must fall in the intersection of several closed sets.
